message: You started high, I'll start low. Your turn to negotiate!
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers, let's see if we can find a middle ground
You're moving in my direction, but I'm still not there yet. Be bold!
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think I've given up too much already. Let's meet in the middle again
I'm getting close to my target, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Don't give up!
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll meet you halfway again, but this might be my last chance
